WebOrganizer.DataBase

Class UserDataManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • WebOrganizer.DataBase.UserDataManagement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserManagementInterface

    public class UserDataManagement
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserManagementInterface
    Class implementing UserManagementInterface. Responsible for accessing the data base with users' nicks and passwords and with tasks

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserDataManagement

        public UserDataManagement(java.lang.String JdbcDriver,
                          java.lang.String databaseName,
                          java.lang.String databaseUserName,
                          java.lang.String databaseUserPassword)
        Constructor. The connection with data base is made only once when the object is created. Tables in data base are made if they do not exist
        Parameters:
        JdbcDriver - driver name
        databaseName - name of the database
        databaseUserName - user name for connecting the database
        databaseUserPassword - password for connecting the database

    • Method Detail

      • checkUser

        public boolean checkUser(java.lang.String nick,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Overriden method for checking if the user is in the base by executing the SQL select statement
        Specified by:
        checkUser in interface UserManagementInterface
        Parameters:
        nick - name of the user to be checked
        password - password of the user to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the user is in the base, if not returns false

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String nick,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Overriden method for adding new account by executing the SQL insert statement
        Specified by:
        addUser in interface UserManagementInterface
        Parameters:
        nick - name of user to be written
        password - password of user to be written

      • saveTasksToBase

        public void saveTasksToBase(java.lang.String date,
                            java.lang.String name)
        Method for saving new tasks to the base by executing the SQL insert statement
        Parameters:
        date - date of the task to be store in the base
        name - name of the task to be store in the base

      • readTaskFromBase

        public void readTaskFromBase(TaskManager taskManager)
        Method for getting data from the base by executing the SQL insert statement. Data is stored in the model object
        Parameters:
        taskManager - model object
